description: Made by Hama, assisted by Meteor w/ technical stuff
name: Part 2.1: Basic PvE Weapon rolls to look for

data.description: Solid Pulse for Kinetic Slot and with a pretty high zoom you can reach pretty far with this. Arrowhead / Fluted are preferred Barrels and Accurized / Flared for Mags. Heating Up is a pretty solid combination with Frenzy, but you can also opt into Feeding Frenzy and Surplus along with Adren Junkie or Rampage. My preference is HU + Frenzy though. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability.
data.name: Legal Action II

data.description: You can get some crazy ranged with this gun, but lacks in perks. SRO-41 Ocular and SRO-37 will allow you to hit for 40m+. Flared and Tac Mag is the go to Mags here and Outlaw is the only good option in your 3rd column. Your go to damage perks are Kill Clip and Rampage, which is somewhat lackluster. My preference is on Kill Clip though. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Last Perdition

data.description: While not amazing, it's can still have some okay PvE rolls. Rapid Hit is the best option in the 3rd column and for dmg perks you'd want Vorpal or Timed Payload. Hammerforged / Smallbore are the Barrels I'd recommend and Accurized / Flared for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Cantata-57

data.description: You can get some fun rolls on this one. Firefly / One For All are your damage options and you'd like to pair this with Subsistence / Rewind Rounds. I'd recommend Fluted / Corkscrew for Barrels and Flared / Tactical for Mags. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload.
data.name: Corrective Measure

data.description: Machine Guns aren't in the best spot, but you can get some fun rolls on this one. Firefly / One For All are your damage options and you'd like to pair this with Subsistence / Rewind Rounds. I'd recommend Fluted / Corkscrew for Barrels and Flared / Tactical for Mags. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload.
data.name: Corrective Measure (Timelost)

data.description: While not amazing on rolls Reconstruction doubles your Mag and enables a lot of shooting. Rampage and Dragonfly are your only real options in the 4th column and for Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and Flared / Tactical for Mags. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Commemoration

data.description: Really good Scout Rifle. The options of One For All, Kill Clip and Frenzy makes this a very potent 260 Scout Rifle and you can pair them with Surplus, Outlaw or Subsistence depending on your preference. For Barrels I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted and Flared / Tactical for Mags. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Contingency Plan

data.description: I prefer Arrowhead here and Fluted as my 2nd choice. Ideally you'd go for Flared, but Tac Mag or Accurized also works. Heating Up is my go to, but Surplus and Subsistence are good as well. Multikill Clip is a solid dmg option, but Adren Junkie works for people who spec into Nade builds. Rampage is also usable. Osmosis is also a very versatile roll. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Scathelocke

data.description: I spent so much time grinding this gun. Ignition Code can roll both Ambitious Assassin and Slideshot which are both very fun perks to mess around with. Hard Launch is my go to Barrel with Spikes, but Quick Launch is also solid. Slideshot enables you to reload by sliding, but Amb Assassin is the more conventional choice. Vorpal for dmg and Demo for Nade builds. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload.
data.name: Ignition Code

data.description: Ignition Code also have some flexible choice when it comes to Blinding Grenades as you can opt into either Slideshot for a fast reload or Quickdraw to always have it ready. Quick / Smart Drift is my go to Barrels and Danger Zone increases the Blinding Nade radius by 3m when procced, but if you're not a fan of Danger Zone you can always opt into Vorpal or Demo. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload.
data.name: Ignition Code

data.description: Frenzy / Adren Junkie is nice damage options on this Slug Shotgun, but the only good option in 3rd column is Auto-Loading. Preferred Barrels are Arrowhead / Fluted and for Mags you'd want Assault / Tactical. Recommended MW: Handling or Range.
data.name: Sojourner's Tale

data.description: Adept Uzume only requires Tactical Mag to hit 7 in the Mag when using Adept Mag mod, which is ideal for the Triple Tap + Vorpal combination. This makes it better than the non adept version in this specific case. I'd recommend Arrowhead / Fluted for Barrels. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload.
data.name: Uzume RR4 (Adept)

data.description: For casual use you'd want Clown along with Vorpal as you can't reliably proc Triple Tap. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and Appended / Tactical for Mags. Recommended MW: Reload.
data.name: Uzume RR4 (Adept)

data.description: Auto-Loading and Lasting Impression is solid for DPS. Quick Launch and Smart Drift are your go to barrels and you'll want Impact Casing as Mag, but Black Powder is also fine. Some people don't like how Lasting Impression can feel unreliable for bosses that go immune, but this is down to preference. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Tomorrow's Answer

data.description: A Wave Frame with pretty lackluster rolls, but still works. Quick Launch / Smart Drift is preferred and as usual you opt into High Velocity Rounds. Ambitious Assassin is very good on Special GL's, but unfortunately there's no good perks to pair it with so you're opting into Rampage or Auto-Loading. Recommended MW: Velocity or Reload.
data.name: Deafening Whisper

data.description: While most High Impact Fusions kinda feel bad, Glacioclasm has the unique perk rolls of Subsistence / Slideshot to pair with Reservoir Burst. My recommended Barrels are Arrowhead / Fluted and Accelerated Coils / Particle Repeater for Batteries. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Glacioclasm

data.description: Solid all around Fusion. Feeding Frenzy and Reservoir Burst is amazing for general ad control and makes this Fusion feel really good in general. Arrowhead and Fluted are preferred Barrels and you'd want Liquid Coils with Reservoir Burst, but Accelerated is fine too. Adaptive Munitions can be good here for higher level content. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability.
data.name: Plug One.1

data.description: Honestly, I mostly consider Compulsive Reloader to be a meme roll, but paired with Reservoir Burst I guess this is the only possible use case for it right now. Even then I'd rather just have Feeding Frenzy. Arrowhead / Fluted and Liquid / Accelerated (Preference). Recommended MW: Handling or Stability.
data.name: Plug One.1

data.description: A Pulse Rifle that is sadly outmatched by other options in PvE. Arrowhead / Fluted are your go to options for Barrel and Flared / Light Mag are your go to Mags. Feeding Frenzy and Multikill Clip are basically your only 3rd and 4th column options here. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Cold Denial

data.description: Fun Sword to mess around with. Chain Reaction on a Caster frame is interesting and allows for some fun in casual content. Vorpal / Frenzy is also decent here. Jagged Edge is preferred, but Honed works too. Swordmaster's Guard is preferred, but as long as you're avoiding Heavy Guard you're fine. The choice between Tireless and Relentless Blade will vary, but for the most part I'd say go for Tireless. Recommended MW: Impact.
data.name: Sola's Scar

data.description: Solid wave frame that can roll either One For All as a general use damage option or Golden Tricorn if you're invested into the Solar subclass. Disruption Break also has a place here, but it's kinda niche. Stats For All maxes out Handling and Reload so that's a good option, but Auto-Loading is also solid. Quick / Smart Drift are the Barrels I'd recommend along with High Velocity Rounds. Recommended MW: Velocity.
data.name: Explosive Personality

data.description: While not having the best combination of rolls, this is a Pulse that I personally really like. Heating Up paired with Frenzy feels very good. Arrowhead / Fluted are your preferred Barrels and you'll want Armor Piercing / Light Mag for your Mag. Heating Up is your best 3rd column perk, while you can opt for Multikill Clip, Adren Junkie or Frenzy as your dmg perk. My preference is Frenzy. Recommended MW: Range or Reload.
data.name: Gridskipper

data.description: Fluted Barrel feels very necessary here to help the gun feel better, but Smallbore / Corkscrew also works. Flared / Tac Mag helps push the Reload faster, but Accurized if Frenzy. Dynamic Sway / Heating Up makes this gun feel a lot better to use and is my preferred roll for 3rd column. Outlaw also works though. Frenzy and Multikill Clip are your dmg options, my preference being Frenzy. Demo is also okay for Nade builds. Recommended MW: Range or Reload.
data.name: Chrysura Melo

data.description: This gun has potential for build crafting. Truesight / Steadyhand is your go to Sights and you can use either Flared / Tactical for Mags depending on what you want. Demo is one of your core perks in the 3rd column and with this you can either opt into a Nade focused build with Adren Junkie or Osmosis if you want. Recommended MW: Range / Reload.
data.name: Judgment

data.description: Mostly just a fun roll for Ad clear with Chain Reaction. Hard Launch / Quick Launch are your preferred Barrels and you can use this with either Clown or Auto-Loading. Spike Grenades are a 50% damage increase on direct impact so they're a must. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload.
data.name: Memory Interdict

data.description: An alright SMG overall, my preferred dmg perk is One For All, but Kill Clip / Swash / Rampage can also work. I'd recommend pairing this with Perpetual Motion, but Feeding Frenzy / Subsistence are also good choices. Hammerforged / Full Bore would be my recommended Barrels and Accurized for Mag, but Flared is also fine. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Cold Front

data.description: A solid Rapid Fire Fusion. Red Dot Micro is your 1st choice of Sight and Red Dot 2 MOA is your 2nd best option. Liquid / Accelerated Coils is mostly preference, but in this case I prefer Liquid. Feeding Frenzy and Vorpal are your best 3rd and 4th column perks, though you can opt into Swashbuckler. Recommended MW: Stability or Range.
data.name: Cartesian Coordinate

data.description: While outshined by Reeds and Cataclysmic, Threaded Needle still has use as a Void LFR. Frenzy / Vorpal are your best dmg options and both Clown / Auto-Loading works well with these. My preferred Barrels are Arrowhead / Fluted and for Batteries I'd like Enhanced / Liquid. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Threaded Needle

data.description: This Scout offers insane range. Rifle Scope SSF will allow you to hit targets at 105m+, but this is never necessary so Red Dot Micro and Red Dot 2 MOA are fine. High Cal is nice, but you can also opt into Armor Piercing if using this against Barriers. Rapid Hit and Vorpal / One For All / Osmosis are your only real options in 3rd and 4th column. Recommended MW: Handling
data.name: The Guiding Sight

data.description: Heavy GL's are not in a good spot right now, but this one still has some rolls that you can mess around with. Hard Launch is my go to barrel, with Quick Launch being my 2nd choice. Clown Cartridge or Field Prep is what you want here and you'd pair with Chain Reaction, Vorpal or Kill Clip for damage. Spike Grenades give a 50% dmg increase on direct impact so they're a must. Recommended MW: Handling or Reload.
data.name: Canis Major

data.description: Multikill Clip and Feeding Frenzy are your only real options here. Hammerforged / Full Bore are my recommended Barrels along with Armor Piercing / Light Mag for Mags. Phase Mag is a cool concept, but is in the end just detrimental to your gun. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Stochastic Variable

data.description: For a 360 Auto, Herod feels surprisingly good to use. For dmg perks you'd mostly want to opt into One For All, but Frenzy can work too. You'd want to pair these with Stats For All (my preference) or Perpetual Motion. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and Armor Piercing / Flared for Mags. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Herod-C

data.description: An okay Pulse Rifle. Being able to roll Adren Junkie for Nade builds or Multikill Clip / Frenzy for general damage gives it some versatility. Subsistence and Heating Up are the main perks I'd use in the 3rd column. Arrowhead / Fluted would be my recommended Barrels and Flared / Light Mag for Mags. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Jurassic Green

data.description: Hawkmoon is a stat monster of a Hand Cannon, but is very limited on rolls. I'd recommend Smallbore / Corkscrew for Barrel and Smooth / Polymer for Grips. In PvE you'll mostly want Surplus, but Rangefinder is also fine.
data.name: Hawkmoon

data.description: Vorpal works very well on this gun in general as it's the only damage perk it can roll. Smallbore / Corkscrew are my recommended Barrels and High-Cal / Flared for Mags. The Stocks are mostly versatile depending on preference, but I'd go for Short-Action / Hand-Laid.
data.name: Dead Man's Tale

data.description: Primarily used for Headstone, but Eyasluna does that job better tbh. Fluted / Hammerforged are my recommended Barrels and Accurized / Flared for Mags. Outlaw and Headstone for 3rd and 4th column. Recommended MW: Range or Handling.
data.name: Vulpecula

data.description: I don't see much use for this outside of Headstone shenanigans. Arrowhead / Fluted are your go to Barrels and you'll want Accurized or Flared for your Mag. The choice between Stats For All, Perpetual Motion and Subsistence ends up being just preference. I'd go with Stats For All though. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Recurrent Impact

data.description: Being able to roll Rapid Hit is always very good for Scouts, but you can also make do with Subsistence / Surplus. Hung Jury has solid dmg options available such as Explosive Payload, Firefly and One For All. Personally I prefer Explosive. Recommended Barrels would be Arrowhead / Fluted and for Mags I'd go for Flared / Tactical. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Hung Jury SR4

data.description: Not made up my mind what I feel is best here yet.
data.name: Ragnhild-D

data.description: Triple Tap along with Vorpal is the DPS way to go on this weapon, but the non adept version requires Appended or Extended along with Backup Mag to reach 7 in the Mag. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels. Recommended MW: Reload or Handling.
data.name: Uzume RR4

data.description: For casual use you'd want Clown along with Vorpal as you can't reliably proc Triple Tap. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and Appended / Flared for Mags. Recommended MW: Reload.
data.name: Uzume RR4

data.description: Multimach is a menace in both PvE and PvP. Due to Model 8 Red and Model 6 Loop it has higher range than all other current 900 RPM SMG's and you can push this further by using Accurized, but Flared is also fine for your Mag. For your 3rd column is Subsistence and Threat Detector both fine, but you can also utilize Killing Wind. For dmg you'll mostly want One For All or Kill Clip. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Multimach CCX

data.description: Overflow & Frenzy feels really smooth on this gun and is my favorite roll here. Pushing the Range of this gun is what I'd want as you already get a ton of Handling an Reload from Frenzy. For Barrels I'd recommend Hammerforged / Smallbore and for Mags I'd say Accurized, but Flared is also fine. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Extraordinary Rendition

data.description: Not usually my go to Pulse, but with Stats for All and One For All combination this suddenly got potential. Arrowhead / Fluted is preferred Barrels and you'll either want Flared Magwell or Accurized for Mag. While this used to be a somewhat lackluster gun for PvE, with the addition of Stats for All it became a lot better. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Forge's Pledge

data.description: I'm not too keen on Sidearms, but this one can roll One For All and Frenzy for dmg options which makes it interesting. I'd recommend pairing those with either Threat Detector or Overflow, but Rapid Hit is also good. Recommended Barrels I'd say Fluted / Corkscrew and Flared / Light Mag for Mags. Recommended MW: Range or Stability.
data.name: Brass Attacks

data.description: Heavy GL's aren't in a really good spot, but Typhon is the only non sunset one who can currently roll Explosive Light. It can also roll Adren Junkie for Nade builds. You'll want Hard / Quick Launch and Spike Grenades. Demo is your best perk in 3rd column. Recommended MW: Handling / Reload.
data.name: Typhon GL5

data.description: Demo + Adren Junke is a potent combination on the right weapons. I'd recommend Fluted / Corkscrew for Barrels and Flared / Tactical for Mags. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Corrective Measure (Timelost)

data.description: Demo + Adren Junke is a potent combination on the right weapons and while Machine Guns can make use of it well. I'd recommend Fluted / Corkscrew for Barrels and Flared / Tactical for Mags. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Corrective Measure

data.description: Solid Pulse for Kinetic Slot and with a pretty high zoom you can reach pretty far with this. Arrowhead / Fluted are preferred Barrels and Accurized / Flared for Mags. Heating Up is a pretty solid combination with Frenzy, but you can also opt into Feeding Frenzy and Surplus along with Adren Junkie or Rampage. My preference is HU + Frenzy though. Recommended MW: Handling or Stability.
data.name: Legal Action II

data.description: One For All and Overflow is a solid combination on this gun, but without Frenzy I'd prefer Flared / Tactical for Mags rather than Accurized. Hammerforged / Smallbore are still my preferred Barrels though. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Extraordinary Rendition

data.description: Very solid SMG overall, Multikill Clip, One For All and Frenzy are all good dmg options for this gun and you can pair them all with Subsistence / Surplus. My personal preference is Frenzy or OFA with Overflow though. For Barrels I'd say Hammerforged / Smallbore and for Mags Accurized / Flared. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Extraordinary Rendition

data.description: Amazing weapon to use against Barrier Champions, out classes every other weapon in this regard. It also shines in PvP due to being a Special LFR with very high Aim Assist values.
data.name: Arbalest

data.description: Solid all around Rocket Launcher that can be used very effectively in all types of content.
data.name: Gjallarhorn

data.description: I really enjoy this Kinetic 720 rpm Auto as it feels very good to use. Feeding Frenzy is IMO the best 3rd column perk and you pair this with Kill Clip / Rampage for normal usage or Adren Junkie if speccing into Nade builds. Arrowhead / Fluted are my recommended Barrels and you'd want Accurized for Mag, but Flared is also fine. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Chroma Rush

data.description: A good feeling auto, if you prefer using Heating Up / Subsistence you can pair this with Kill Clip / Rampage for normal usage or Adren Junkie if speccing into Nade builds. Arrowhead / Fluted would be my go to Barrels, but for Mags I'd recommend Flared / Tactical since you're not getting Reload Speed from your 3rd column. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Chroma Rush

data.description: Fourth Times, Outlaw, Subsistence are all solid general use options for this gun, though I'm of the opinion that Vorpal is generally better. For Barrels I'd prefer Smallbore / Corkscrew and High-Cal / Ricochet for Mags. Stocks are kinda versatile depending on preference, but I'd recommend using Short-Action / Hand-Laid.
data.name: Dead Man's Tale

data.description: If you have an older roll you might have one of these. Quick Launch and Smart Drift are your go to barrels and you'll want Alloy Casing as Mag, but Impact Casing is also fine. Field Prep and Clown work well together and is a neat combination for normal play. Impulse Amplifier is also good. Recommended MW: Handling.
data.name: Tomorrow's Answer

data.description: Fluted Barrel feels very necessary here to help the gun feel better, but Smallbore / Corkscrew also works. Flared / Tac Mag helps push the Reload faster, but Accurized if Frenzy. Dynamic Sway / Heating Up makes this gun feel a lot better to use and is my preferred roll for 3rd column. Outlaw also works though. Frenzy and Multikill Clip are your dmg options, my preference being Frenzy. Demo is also okay for Nade builds. Recommended MW: Range or Reload.
data.name: Chrysura Melo

data.description: Not usually my go to Pulse, but with Stats for All and One For All combination this suddenly got potential. Arrowhead / Fluted is preferred Barrels and you'll either want Flared Magwell or Accurized for Mag. While this used to be a somewhat lackluster gun for PvE, with the addition of Stats for All it became a lot better. Multikill Clip / Rampage are other dmg perk options though. Recommended MW: Range.
data.name: Forge's Pledge
